usage.xs: Inline with caption text, tight spaces, data density
usage.sm: Inline with body text, list items, compact UI
usage.md: Form inputs, buttons, navigation items, default size
usage.lg: Section headers, feature highlights, primary actions
usage.xl: Page headers, empty states, prominent features
usage.xxl: Hero sections, large empty states, onboarding

inline.description: Icons that appear inline with text (body or caption)

button.description: Icons inside buttons, links, interactive elements

status.description: Status indicators, badges, tags alongside text

header.description: Section headers, page titles, feature callouts

notes.consistency: Use md (20px) for most interactive elements to maintain visual hierarchy
notes.alignment: Icons should vertically align with adjacent text using flexbox
notes.color: Icons inherit color from parent or use semantic colors for status/state
notes.accessibility: Always provide aria-label or sr-only text for icon-only buttons
